description:
Their next job is the "City Revival New Project Presentation".
Having received no details, Nanako and Yukari enter their dressing room while wondering if they`ll get a new member, where they find Nagarekawa`s local mascot Uogokoro-kun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On a essayé de le porter puis de l`enlever
We Tried Putting It On. We Tried Taking It Off.
着てみた. 脱いでみた.
